DOC.brief_summary: Patients randomly assign one two group use random number generator . Group 1 provide in-office instruction standard care eccentric exercise rotator cuff tendinopathy . Group 2 provide in-office instruction well instructional exercise video source ( DVD ) take home reminder perform two specific standard care eccentric exercise rotator cuff tendinopathy . Each group give card track adherence standard care eccentric exercise routine measure day accomplish exercise . Study exercise diary collect 12 week treatment . Eccentric exercise teach part standard care rotator cuff tendinopathy .
DOC.detailed_description: DoD beneficiary age 18 older recruit clinic Mike O'Callaghan Federal Medical Center ( MOFMC ) . Subjects meet inclusion/exclusion criterion offer opportunity participate : Screening Visit : - Obtain sign Informed Consent Document HIPAA Authorization . - Verify inclusion/exclusion criterion Visit 1 ( may occur day Screening Visit ) : - Subjects randomly assign one two group Research Coordinator use random number generator , thus Investigators blind group assignment : - Group 1 : in-office instruction standard care eccentric exercise regimen rotator cuff tendinopathy . - Group 2 : in-office instruction standard care eccentric exercise regimen rotator cuff tendinopathy instructional exercise video source ( DVD ) . - Subjects give study exercise diary track adherence standard care eccentric exercise routine . Visit 2 ( 12 week post Visit 1 ) : â€¢ Study exercise diary collect assess adherence . If subject unable come , return study exercise diary via mail , electronic mail .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : DoD beneficiary patient 18 year old Diagnosis chronic ( > 30 day ) shoulder pain etiology ( traumatic v overuse injury ) Exclusion : Patients < 18 year age Patients acute injury ( fracture injury within 30 day ) Patients unable accomplish eccentric exercise regimen without assistance Patients unable view DVD Pregnant woman Patients unable read and/or understand English
